long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Discover the power of Symbaloo Search, a Symbaloo-based search engine designed to provide you with informative and relevant results. This extension enhances your browsing by integrating the convenience of Symbalooâ€™s search capabilities directly into your browser. Whether youâ€™re looking for educational resources, professional tools, or personal interests, Symbaloo Search delivers high-quality results tailored to your needs. Enhance your online research and resource discovery with Symbaloo Search â€“ the perfect tool for educators, students, and anyone seeking a more efficient way to find information on the web.

About Symbaloo

With Symbaloo you surf with one click to all of your favorite websites.

Symbaloo is an easy-to-use online application and best of all, itâ€™s free. You will have all of your favorite websites at your fingertips, anywhere and always. Choose your favorite websites and within a few clicks, you can create your very own homepage. With an account, your favorites are available on any iPhone, PC, Mac, iPad, and tablet. Wherever you go, you always have access to your favorite websites. 

In 2024 over 6 million people are using Symbaloo as their homepage!

âœ”ï¸ With one click you go anywhere on the web
âœ”ï¸ Add a new website with one click to your account
âœ”ï¸ Never lose your favorite websites again
âœ”ï¸ Free!
